Pre-Game Insights: Both Kyrgyzstan and North Korea are aiming to pick up their first wins of the third round in the AFC Cup World Cup qualifier.
Kyrgyzstan suffered a heavy defeat at the home of Qatar last time out, while North Korea played out a draw with the United Arab Emirates.
Kyrgyzstan are one of two sides in the third round of AFC World Cup qualifying who are yet to collect any points from their opening three matches.
North Korea have recorded back-to-back draws with Qatar and the United Arab Emirates since a narrow loss to Uzbekistan on September 5.
North Korea are viewing the match against Kyrgyzstan as a major opportunity to record their maiden victory of the third round.
